Alerts

Alerts are available to notify the user, and use contextual classes.

File to include

@include "components/alerts";

Without button

Success!

Success text

Error!

Error text

Warning!

Warning text

<div class="alert alert-success">
    <span></span>
    <i class="icon icon-check-circle-solid"></i>
    <div class="container-alert">
            <p class="title-alert">Success!</p>
            <p class="text-alert">Success text</p>
    </div>
</div>

<div class="alert alert-danger">
    <span></span>
    <i class="icon icon-not-allowed-solid"></i>
    <div class="container-alert">
            <p class="title-alert">Error!</p>
            <p class="text-alert">Error text</p>
    </div>
</div>

<div class="alert alert-warning">
    <span></span>
    <i class="icon icon-warning-bold"></i>
    <div class="container-alert">
            <p class="title-alert">Warning!</p>
            <p class="text-alert">Warning text</p>
    </div>
</div>

With 1 button

Success!

Success text

Ok

Error!

Error text

Ok

Warning!

Warning text

Ok 
<div class="alert alert-success">
    <span></span>
    <i class="icon icon-check-circle-solid"></i>
    <div class="container-alert">
            <p class="title-alert">Success!</p>
            <p class="text-alert">Success text</p>
    </div>
    <div class="buttons">
            <a href="#" class="btn btn-rectangle btn-success">Ok</a>
    </div>
</div>

<div class="alert alert-danger">
    <span></span>
    <i class="icon icon-not-allowed-solid"></i>
    <div class="container-alert">

    </div>

    </div>
</div>

With 2 buttons

Cancel Ok

<div class="alert alert-success">
    <span></span>
    <i class="icon icon-check-circle-solid"></i>
    <div class="container-alert">
            <p class="title-alert">Success!</p>
            <p class="text-alert">Success text</p>
    </div>
    <div class="buttons">
            <a href="#" class="btn btn-rectangle btn-outline btn-gray">Cancel</a>
            <a href="#" class="btn btn-rectangle btn-success">Ok</a>
    </div>
</div>

<div class="alert alert-danger">
